overview: Francois Leberge is a Computer Engineer, a veteran of the Video Game Industry, and an entrepreneur. He has worked at many prominent Game Companies such as Ubisoft, Relic, and Rockstar. 5 years ago he switched to working in Web related startups and hasnâ€™t looked back. He has given many talks on HTML5, Mobile, Games, and the future of the web. Francois is an ardent supporter of the Web as a platform and is dedicated to pushing itâ€™s potential to the limit. He is solely responsible for building the revolutionary software behind the zero install, zero setup, and HTML5 platform of Emotely. Emotely has since been acquired by Brass Monkey for it’s HTML5 technology.
